name: GitHub
desc: This is my GitHub account. this is where you can go to find all of the most up-to-date information on all of my work including most of the projects mentioned on this website such as the Computer vision project and the Android application. The only exception to that rule is projects which I am working on by myself and do not want to share as of yet.

name: Linked In
desc: This is my linked in profile. I'm am not a regular social media user, and therefore this is the only social media website that I tend to use, and even at that, I don't use it too often. And because of this, the information on there may not always be as up-to-date as it should. But I try to keep my LinkedIn and this website as synchronized as possible.

name: Current Project
desc: This card is for the current project that I'm working on.  Currently, the project I'm working on is the Computer Vision application, which was programmed in C++. And my goal with it is to rewrite the whole project using Python. It has been some time since I have had to Use Python and I think that this will allow me the opportunity to do so.
